explains: n. 出现，显现；崭露头角；摆脱困境
wordGroup: rate of emergence 出苗率；种子发芽率

sentences.en: What is the custom and usage in this emergence?
sentences.cn: 这里出现的习俗和用法是什么？

sentences.en: We saw the emergence of flight search engines such as Kayak and Skyscanner.
sentences.cn: 我们看到了诸如 Kayak 和 Skyscanner 这些航班搜索引擎的出现。

sentences.en: It is difficult to isolate the factors that led to the next development—the emergence of urban settlements.
sentences.cn: 推动其进一步发展，即城市聚居点出现的诸多因素，是很难孤立出来看待的。
